"Quilla": "I'm Quilla. My hobby is to uncover the mysteries of Halpha."
"Actually, after the Lecielans showed up, most of those mysteries got spoiled for people like me..."
"But there are still things we don't know! That's what I think."
"That's why I wanted to ask for your help, you being the Guardian and all."
"Currently, I'm particularly interested in the Sagaan Mountain Pass, in the west part of Retem."
"I'll fill you in on the rest when you get there."
"Could you go to Sagaan Mountain Pass first? I'll explain when you get there."
"There's one more mystery! Next, I want you to go to Mistra Forest!"
